images.caption:
Figure 1:WhiStressArchitecture. The Whisper model is kept frozen during training. The extension is a transformer decoder block with cross-attention
for the audio embeddings, followed by an FCNN classifier that outputs the stress score per token.
Figure 2:Prosodic features prediction by Mean Absolute Error (MAE) percentage of Whisper layer embeddings. A lower MAE percentage indicates better prediction. Each curve shows confidence intervals.
